main.name: Tacklestar
main.description: I am a Developer who never wants to stop Learning
main.bio: I am Tarun Dyundi from Delhi, India. A dynamic, self-motivated and work-oriented individual in pursuit of learning everyday. Currently, I am pursuing my B.Tech, in Electronics and Communication Engineering from GB Pant Institute of Engineering and Technology, Uttarakhand. As a developer, I have working experience of projects related to Robotics, IOT, Web Development, Databases, and Machine Learning.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me ? Think I'd be a good fit for your team ? I'd love to hear from you, Please reach out via the contact form below if you'd like to get in contact with me. I will respond as soon as possible.

resume.skillmessage: Here is a small collection of my most relevant skills :

education.school: GB Pant Institute of Engineering and Technology

work.title: Machine Learning Intern
work.description: As an Intern at Widhya, I worked over statistical analysis and visualization of data on an everyday basis and then predicting the outcome of various tasks. I also worked on various ML projects related to Recommender System and Sentiment Analysis being a part of Widhya

work.title: Data Science Intern
work.description: As a Data Science and Analytics Intern, I was working on analyzing different datasets. My task was to analyze and test different ML models which fit the accuracy parameters
